page.title: 12HEALTH.
page.content: The only doctor's practice here is in Ripley: there are Group practices nearby in West Byfleet and East Horsley. The Orthopaedic hospital in Pyrford is the subject of a Special Feature. A District nurse provides some care in the home, particularly for convalescents and there is a special Health visitor for the elderly, who also regularly visits mothers with young children. There is a mobile physiotherapy van. A neighbouring Day hospital sends an ambulance to collect old people which helps their families. The sewage system was replaced in 1939 by a new Works serving the area and beyond; treated effluent enters the Wey Navigation, controlled by the Thames Water Authority.
